customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Abyss Lector's Smoldering

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Even the bravest of my stray friends dare not approach that imposing, mysterious stranger. It's like the very air around them might combust at any moment..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: After "Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames" triggers "Fiery Rebirth," they will gain the "Shield of Surging Flame."</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames
customize.desc:
Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames

From chapters of canon revealed comes much heeded admonishments.

customize.name: Embers Rekindled
customize.desc:

The path toward sowing grace is not assured to be one free of obstructions.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.name: Embers Rekindled
customize.desc:

The path toward sowing grace is not assured to be one free of obstructions.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Abyss Lector's Deflagration

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Though our mysterious guest seems to have an air of self-refinement about them, they will occasionally get mad. In those moments, they will spew flames everywhere, flames that are capable of even setting houses far, far away ablaze..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: After "Abyss Lector: Fathomless Flames" triggers "Fiery Rebirth," they will gain the "Shield of Surging Flame."</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text:
<color=#ffffffd9>Prerequisite</color>
Reach Player Level 7
Complete 3 challenge objective(s) in Abyss Lector's Smoldering

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Jadeplume Terrorshroom's Parade

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "It is said that in the depths of the forest, there is a great being at the apex of all Fungi..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Jadeplume Terrorshroom" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Proliferating Spores" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Jadeplume Terrorshroom
customize.desc:
"Lord of Fungi" Jadeplume Terrorshroom

If you keep silent and listen closely, you can here the sound of the ruler of the Shroom-Kin inspecting its territory…

customize.name: Jadeplume Terrorshroom
customize.desc:
"Lord of Fungi" Jadeplume Terrorshroom

If you keep silent and listen closely, you can here the sound of the ruler of the Shroom-Kin inspecting its territory…

customize.name: Proliferating Spores
customize.desc:
Spore Dust Cloud

Few can safely traverse the traps laid by the Fungus with intelligence above that of the average living being.

customize.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Achieve victory with characters defeated less than twice during the battle</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Jadeplume Terrorshroom's Display

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow!" "It is believed that when the Jadeplume Terrorshroom fans out those spectacular tail feathers and spread out its wings, it's exhibiting its most stunning yet most deadly form..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Jadeplume Terrorshroom" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Proliferating Spores" equipped.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>
